Join Bangladesh Navy Job Application Procedure

Join Bangladesh Navy job circular 2024 is a golden career opportunity and a great chance to get a Government job in Bangladesh. So, do you want to apply for the Navy job circular 2024? We have discussed here how to apply for Bangladesh Nou Bahini job circular 2024.

Now the question is how to apply. The Bangladesh Navy Job application process is online base. So, all interested and eligible applicants can apply online easily at Join Bangladesh Navy mil bd official website which is www.joinnavy.navy.mil.bd.

joinnavy.navy.mil.bd Apply Process Step by Step

BD Navy job circular 2024 is a very attractive career opportunity for Govt job seekers in Bangladesh. So, if you want to submit your job application at joinnavy.navy.mil.bd for the Join Bangladesh Navy circular 2024, follow the procedure below.

To apply online for Join Bangladesh Navy in 2024, follow these steps:

Go to the official website of Join Bangladesh Navy at https://joinnavy.navy.mil.bd.

Click on “Apply Now” on the left side of the Home Page to apply for the desired course.

Follow the instructions provided during the application process.

When you reach the final stage of the application, you will need to pay an application fee using online banking (such as VISA, Master Card and American Express) or mobile banking (such as bKash, Rocket, t-cash, cash, SureCash, MCash, MyCash, OneCash, EasyCash, QCash, Nexus, Amex, etc.). Detailed information about the payment process will be mentioned in the Bangladesh Navy job application form.

Once you have paid the application fee, you will receive a call-up letter to participate in the written test.

Download and print the Call-up Letter, Form Commission-1A (Completed Application Form), and Personal Information Form for the initial interview, along with all the other required documents.

If you are unable to download the call-up letter and form, you can re-sign in to the website using the Roll and Tracking number provided in your mobile number.

If you encounter any difficulties in applying online, please contact the customer support number shown on the official website or visit the official website for further assistance.

Bangladesh Navy Selection Procedure

As per the Bangladesh Navy job circular 2024, the candidate selection process consists of the following steps:

Primary Health and Viva Examination: The participants will undergo a primary health examination, and those who pass will have to appear for the primary oral/viva exam.

Written Test: Candidates who qualify the Bangladesh Navy preliminary selection test will have to appear for a written exam covering intelligence, English, and general knowledge subjects at the venue specified in the interview letter.

ISSB Exam and Viva: Candidates who pass the written test will be examined and interviewed by ISSB at Inter-Army Selection Board (ISSB), Dhaka Cantonment, Dhaka.

Final Health Examination: During the ISSB examination, candidates will have to appear for the final health examination.

Final Selection and Joining: Upon fulfilling the medical requirements, the candidate will receive the final selection and the date of joining the course. The Bangladesh Navy will hold Final Selection Board activities to select suitable candidates by December 2023.
